QuestData.Title: The Crown of the Triumvirate
QuestData.Description: We begin our search now, $n.$b$bThe Crown of the Triumvirate was created to spread the Light's touch to all. With it, our culture thrived.$b$bWhen I fled Argus with the Draenei, I took one shard of the Crown with me to ensure that it would not fall into the wrong hands.$b$b<Velen tips his staff forward and gestures to the central crystal.>$b$bKil'jaeden and Archimonde's fragments are still here. I will seek them out, but you will need to safeguard me while I search.$b$bStay close, my friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Velen while he locates fragments of the Crown of the Triumvirate.
